text: Guft (Su'ajʙ): Ej qavmi man, ojo qaʙilai man dar nazdi sumo az Allohi ʙarhaq ʙolotaru giromitar ast? Ojo Allohro pusti sar qaror medihed va az U nametarsed va qudratu izzati Vajro ʙuzurg namedored? Hol on ki Parvardigori man ʙar har kore, ki mekuned, onro ihota dorad. Hamai amalhoi ʙandagonasro medonad va muvofiqi on cazo medihad
